title: Logo i worked on
content:
here is logo for soap that actually i working on. drawing by mouse it looks some weak. so what i can do? maybe redraw? ![:)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014021420im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
 ![chanson](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014021420im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/3004.gif)
author: andrij

comments.content:
Does it say "Chanson"? I hope "changor" doesn't mean anything bad in Russian... Or is this targeted at expat frenchies? ;-) Actually, I think the terminal "n" is OK, but you might consider giving the "s" a full "long-s" form (with an ascender).   
   
hhp

thank you, Hrant and Ole   
   
please look at some fixed variant:   
 ![chans](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014021420im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/3017.gif)   
   
unfortunately, client reject with this hand-writen style

Is their soap made with bricks?...   
   
Maybe try looking at Folha and Floris by deGroot for inspiration.   
   
hhp
